team.name: Katee Hunter
team.bioHtml: CEO/Founder of INVEZTOR. Previously worked on Startups in London & APAC, M&A Consulting @PwC in UK & North America. Stats nerd.

jobs.title: Web Video Content Creator
jobs.description: We are looking to make an introductory/explainer style video to describe what our customer requirement and product is. We are looking to use basic animation to explain pain points from a customer perspective and the proposed solution. Video will be less that 3 minutes. We are looking for interns who are interested in gaining experience with a startup that is early-stage and has a profolio they would like to add to. Video will be presented during a funding round pitch to an internation investor group. Please contact Katee for further information.
